text: Shri Vishwakarma Skill University, Haryana, earlier known as Haryana Vishwakarma Skill University (HVSU) is a university established by the Government of Haryana at Dudhola village of Palwal district of India.Haryana making rural inroads to reach poll highway, Economic Times, 9 Mar 2018. It is currently running from a temporary campus in Gurugram.Haryana cabinet approves amendments in Haryana Vishwakarma University bill, United News of India, 25 Jul 2017. It has MoU with several industries and entities to impart skills training.For employing youth, Haryana to open skill development centres, including Gurgaon, Hindustan Times, 21 April 2017. == History == It was established in 2016 via an legislative act of Government of Haryana,Haryana Vishwakarma Skill University, Govt. of Haryana invites applications for various positions , SkillsReporter.com, 24 Nov 2017. to impart skills training.Haryana govt sets target to impart skill training, Outlook India, 1 Aug 2017. == The University== ===Objectives=== It was set up to develop entrepreneurship and skill based education and research in the emerging areas of various sectors. ===Courses=== The University offers dual vocational education model in the integrated work and study mode in accordance with the National Skill Qualification Frame work (NSQF), where students will work in the industries across various locations in the State with flexible class timings. == See also == * List of institutions of higher education in Haryana == References == Category:Universities in Haryana
title: Shri Vishwakarma Skill University
